results.definition: determine or indicate the place, site, or limits of, as if by an instrument or by a survey
examples: Our sense of sight enables us to locate objects in space
Locate the boundaries of the property
She posited her hand on his shoulder
deposit the suitcase on the bench
fix your eyes on this spot

results.definition: situated in a particular spot or position
examples: a house set on a hilltop
nicely situated on a quiet riverbank
